<@403636673914863626> did eventually find the bug, there was an issue with the open-rpc-gatsby-theme code, originally you're able to just add md or mdx files to src/docs directory in the generated codebase.  Then you add a menu link to it in the config and it would showed up in the sidebar. 

I have PR up that I believe will fix it , probably land tomorrow ðŸ™‚ 
https://github.com/open-rpc/generator/pull/731

For more context, the OpenRPC team has been talking and we think we'll commit to doing a documentation generation overhaul to our upcoming roadmap for the year. 

We are going to target having docusaurus as a base again and  styling to be more in line with something like https://mintlify.com  docs. 

If you have any feedback or thoughts on things you'd like to see in that overhaul feel free to shoot me a DM ðŸ™‚
